name: Yoga and Creative Arts Programs
description: The Art of Yoga Project offers trauma-informed and strength-based yoga and creative expression programming to marginalized youth in the San Francisco Bay Area. We partner with county behavioral health, education, probation, judiciary, departments of children, youth and family services, and other community-based organizations. update 12/15/2023
